quests.name: Thaumic Energistics
quests.description: When the old houses began to split along technological and magical lines they hobbled themselves without knowing it. Both believed their respective world view was vastly superior and failed to recognise there was any good in the other. Those few technocrats in the magical houses were burned as heretics. Those few magicians in the technological houses were shot as charlatans. With the passage of time these views became cemented to such a degree no deviation could even be considered. Only in the new world where priorities were driven by the need to survive were people willing to draw from any useful discipline. In the old world much suffering could have been avoided had their arrogance blinded them. Let?s hope you will not repeat their mistakes.

tasks.longDescription: To unlock this knowledge make XXX of YYY and hand them in. Then find and use the chair in the room marked with ZZZZ

quests.name: Thaumic Energistics -->
quests.description: Will unlock next to this quest once AE2 and ThaumCraft are both researched. This is just for information

quests.name: Draconic Evolution
quests.description: Well done! You have mastered all the tech of the old world and now even the power of dragons shall be yours. Use it wisely for you have become the destroyer of world.

tasks.longDescription: To unlock the ultimate power craft XXX of YYY and use the chair in the room marked ZZZ.
Find the room in the magic section of the temple

quests.name: Draconic Evolution -->
quests.description: Requires TerraSteel, SFArtifact and RF-Advanced. to unlock this quest is just for information.

quests.name: Magic Bees --->
quests.description: Requires Thaumcraft / ChromatiCraft / ExtraBees to unlock.
